title: CPE  cannot start after plug-in power adapter
answer:
(1) The power adapter is not well connected occasionally. You can re-plug the power adapter
(2) Some CPEs have power button, you should press it to power on
(3) If all the indicators on the panel blink once immediately after press the power on button, it indicates that the CPE is starting,the startup of CPE takes about one minute. You may have to wait for a while.
(4) Use the default power adapter attached with CPE, otherwise the CPE will be damaged
